title: Digital Edge Detection Based Pneumonia Detection in Chest Radiographs
details: RG Poola, PT Kommineni, PL Lahari, SS Yellampalli - ITM Web of Conferences, 2024
abstract: In response to the demand of pneumonia diagnosis, a digital detection algorithm utilizing chest X-ray images has been proposed. Despite this, X-ray images have the tendency of noise and spatial aliasing that tend to cause blurring of some …

title: UniMed-CLIP: Towards a Unified Image-Text Pretraining Paradigm for Diverse Medical Imaging Modalities
details: M Uzair Khattak, S Kunhimon, M Naseer, S Khan… - arXiv e-prints, 2024
abstract: Abstract Vision-Language Models (VLMs) trained via contrastive learning have achieved notable success in natural image tasks. However, their application in the medical domain remains limited due to the scarcity of openly accessible, large-scale …
